settings.automatic_language_detection_syntax_high: Enable automatic language detection for syntax highlighting

notifications.rule_invite_for_me: When I'm invited to a room
notifications.error_permissions_denied: %(brand)s does not have permission to send you notifications - please check your browser settings
notifications.error_permissions_missing: %(brand)s was not given permission to send notifications - please try again

general.email_address_in_use: This email address is already in use
general.msisdn_in_use: This phone number is already in use
general.confirm_adding_email_body: Click the button below to confirm adding this email address.
general.add_email_failed_verification: Failed to verify email address: make sure you clicked the link in the email
general.add_msisdn_confirm_sso_button: Confirm adding this phone number by using Single Sign On to prove your identity.
general.add_msisdn_confirm_body: Click the button below to confirm adding this phone number.
general.error_password_change_403: Failed to change password. Is your password correct?
general.error_invalid_email_detail: This doesn't appear to be a valid email address

key_export_import.export_description_1: This process allows you to export the keys for messages you have received in encrypted rooms to a local file. You will then be able to import the file into another Matrix client in the future, so that client will also be able to decrypt these messages.
key_export_import.import_description_1: This process allows you to import encryption keys that you had previously exported from another Matrix client. You will then be able to decrypt any messages that the other client could decrypt.
key_export_import.import_description_2: The export file will be protected with a passphrase. You should enter the passphrase here, to decrypt the file.

m.room.join_rules.public: %(senderDisplayName)s made the room public to whoever knows the link.

m.room.guest_access.can_join: %(senderDisplayName)s has allowed guests to join the room.
m.room.guest_access.forbidden: %(senderDisplayName)s has prevented guests from joining the room.

m.room.canonical_alias.set: %(senderName)s set the main address for this room to %(address)s.
m.room.canonical_alias.removed: %(senderName)s removed the main address for this room.

m.room.third_party_invite.revoked: %(senderName)s revoked the invitation for %(targetDisplayName)s to join the room.
m.room.third_party_invite.sent: %(senderName)s sent an invitation to %(targetDisplayName)s to join the room.

m.room.history_visibility.invited: %(senderName)s made future room history visible to all room members, from the point they are invited.
m.room.history_visibility.joined: %(senderName)s made future room history visible to all room members, from the point they joined.
m.room.history_visibility.shared: %(senderName)s made future room history visible to all room members.
m.room.history_visibility.world_readable: %(senderName)s made future room history visible to anyone.
m.room.history_visibility.unknown: %(senderName)s made future room history visible to unknown (%(visibility)s).

m.room.pinned_events.changed: %(senderName)s changed the pinned messages for the room.

load_error.no_permission: Tried to load a specific point in this room's timeline, but you do not have permission to view the message in question.
load_error.unable_to_find: Tried to load a specific point in this room's timeline, but was unable to find it.
load_error.title: Failed to load timeline position

scalar_starter_link.dialog_description: You are about to be taken to a third-party site so you can authenticate your account for use with %(integrationsUrl)s. Do you wish to continue?

slash_command.plain: Sends a message as plain text, without interpreting it as markdown
slash_command.html: Sends a message as html, without interpreting it as markdown
slash_command.upgraderoom: Upgrades a room to a new version
slash_command.upgraderoom_permission_error: You do not have the required permissions to use this command.
slash_command.myroomnick: Changes your display nickname in the current room only
slash_command.roomavatar: Changes the avatar of the current room
slash_command.topic: Gets or sets the room topic
slash_command.invite: Invites user with given id to current room
slash_command.ignore: Ignores a user, hiding their messages from you
slash_command.unignore: Stops ignoring a user, showing their messages going forward
slash_command.addwidget: Adds a custom widget by URL to the room
slash_command.rainbow: Sends the given message colored as a rainbow
slash_command.rainbowme: Sends the given emote colored as a rainbow
slash_command.addwidget_invalid_protocol: Please supply an https:// or http:// widget URL
slash_command.addwidget_no_permissions: You cannot modify widgets in this room.
slash_command.discardsession: Forces the current outbound group session in an encrypted room to be discarded
slash_command.op: Define the power level of a user
slash_command.server_error_detail: Server unavailable, overloaded, or something else went wrong.

voip.call_failed_microphone: Call failed because microphone could not be accessed. Check that a microphone is plugged in and set up correctly.
voip.call_failed_media: Call failed because webcam or microphone could not be accessed. Check that:
voip.call_failed_media_connected: A microphone and webcam are plugged in and set up correctly
voip.call_failed_media_permissions: Permission is granted to use the webcam
voip.user_busy_description: The user you called is busy.
voip.call_failed_description: The call could not be established
voip.answered_elsewhere_description: The call was answered on another device.
voip.misconfigured_server: Call failed due to misconfigured server
voip.misconfigured_server_description: Please ask the administrator of your homeserver (%(homeserverDomain)s) to configure a TURN server in order for calls to work reliably.
voip.cannot_call_yourself_description: You cannot place a call with yourself.
voip.no_permission_conference_description: You do not have permission to start a conference call in this room
voip.no_media_perms_description: You may need to manually permit %(brand)s to access your microphone/webcam

auth.unsupported_auth_msisdn: This server does not support authentication with a phone number.
auth.forgot_password_email_required: The email address linked to your account must be entered.
auth.sign_in_or_register_description: Use your account or create a new one to continue.
auth.session_logged_out_description: For security, this session has been signed out. Please sign in again.
auth.set_email_prompt: Do you want to set an email address?

uia.msisdn_token_prompt: Please enter the code it contains:
uia.sso_title: Use Single Sign On to continue
uia.sso_body: Confirm adding this email address by using Single Sign On to prove your identity.

auth.reset_password_email_not_found_title: This email address was not found

reset_password.password_not_entered: A new password must be entered.
reset_password.passwords_mismatch: New passwords must match each other.

set_email.verification_pending_description: Please check your email and click on the link it contains. Once this is done, click continue.
set_email.description: This will allow you to reset your password and receive notifications.

room_list.failed_remove_tag: Failed to remove tag %(tagName)s from room
room_list.failed_add_tag: Failed to add tag %(tagName)s to room

create_space.add_details_prompt: Add some details to help people recognize it.
create_space.personal_space_description: A private space to organize your rooms

composer.no_perms_notice: You do not have permission to post to this room

room.upgrade_error_description: Double check that your server supports the room version chosen and try again.
room.inaccessible_name: %(roomName)s is not accessible at this time.

status_bar.server_connectivity_lost_title: Connectivity to the server has been lost.
status_bar.server_connectivity_lost_description: Sent messages will be stored until your connection has returned.

file_panel.guest_note: You must register to use this functionality
file_panel.peek_note: You must join the room to see its files

permissions.no_privileged_users: No users have specific privileges in this room

general.publish_toggle: Publish this room to the public in %(domain)s's room directory?
general.user_url_previews_default_on: You have enabled URL previews by default.
general.user_url_previews_default_off: You have disabled URL previews by default.
general.no_aliases_room: This room has no local addresses

advanced.unfederated: This room is not accessible by remote Matrix servers

failed_load_async_component: Unable to load! Check your network connectivity and try again.
upload_failed_size: The file '%(fileName)s' exceeds this homeserver's size limit for uploads

create_room.generic_error: Server may be unavailable, overloaded, or you hit a bug.
create_room.unsupported_version: The server does not support the room version specified.

terms.identity_server_no_terms_title: Identity server has no terms of service
terms.identity_server_no_terms_description_1: This action requires accessing the default identity server <server /> to validate an email address or phone number, but the server does not have any terms of service.
terms.identity_server_no_terms_description_2: Only continue if you trust the owner of the server.

widget.error_need_to_be_logged_in: You need to be logged in.
widget.error_need_invite_permission: You need to be able to invite users to do that.

scalar.error_power_level_invalid: Power level must be positive integer.
scalar.error_membership: You are not in this room.
scalar.error_permission: You do not have permission to do that in this room.

encryption.cancel_entering_passphrase_description: Are you sure you want to cancel entering passphrase?
encryption.export_unsupported: Your browser does not support the required cryptography extensions

error.mixed_content: Can't connect to homeserver via HTTP when an HTTPS URL is in your browser bar. Either use HTTPS or enable unsafe scripts.
error.tls: Can't connect to homeserver - please check your connectivity, ensure your homeserver's SSL certificate is trusted, and that a browser extension is not blocking requests.

session_restore.title: Unable to restore session
session_restore.description_2: If you have previously used a more recent version of %(brand)s, your session may be incompatible with this version. Close this window and return to the more recent version.

user_info.promote_warning: You will not be able to undo this change as you are promoting the user to have the same power level as yourself.

reject_invitation_dialog.title: Reject invitation
reject_invitation_dialog.confirmation: Are you sure you want to reject the invitation?

quit_warning.file_upload_in_progress: You seem to be uploading files, are you sure you want to quit?
quit_warning.call_in_progress: You seem to be in a call, are you sure you want to quit?

leave_room_dialog.leave_room_question: Are you sure you want to leave the room '%(roomName)s'?

search_failed.title: Search failed
search_failed.server_unavailable: Server may be unavailable, overloaded, or search timed out :(

lazy_loading.resync_description: %(brand)s now uses 3-5x less memory, by only loading information about other users when needed. Please wait while we resynchronize with the server!
